S100A.Q1. WHAT IS YOUR ARMY RANK OR GRAD?  01. PRIVATE 02. PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 03. TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE 04. CORPORAL 05. TECHNICIAN 4TH GRADE 06. SERGEANT 07. TECHNICIAN 3RD GRADE 08. STAFF SERGEANT 09. TECHNICAL SERGEANT 10. MASTER SERGEANT OR FIRST SERGEANT 11. OTHER 00. NO ANSWER

S100A.Q6. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE ARM? P. IF YOU HAVE BEEN IN THE ARMY BEFORE, THEN WERE OUT FOR A WHILE, JUST CHECK THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOU ENTERED THIS LAST TIME. IF YOU WERE IN THE NATIONAL GUARD, CHECK THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOUR OUTFIT CAME INTO THE ARMY ON ACTIVE DUTY.  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 9 MONTHS 4. OVER 9 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 5. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 6. OVER 2 YEARS UP TO 3 YEARS 7. OVER 3 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S100A.Q13. WHAT BRANCH OF THE ARMY ARE YOU IN NO?  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 06. ARMORED FORCE 07. SIGNAL CORPS 08. S100A.Q14. WHAT IS YOUR PRESENT ARMY JO? (FOR EXAMPLE, TRUCK DRIVER, CLERK, RIFLEMAN, COOK, RADIO OPERATOR, ETC.)  01. SHOOTING JOBS, RIFLEMEN, GUNNERS, CANNONEERS, TANK MEN, ETC. 02. MEDICS, LITTER BEARERS, FIRST AID MEN, ETC. 03. LIAISON, SCOUT, RUNNERS, MESSENGERS, BAND MEN, ETC. 04. RADIO AND TELEPHONE OPERATORS, WIRE MEN, ETC. 05. DRIVERS, MECHANICS, ETC. 06. COMPUTERS, SURVEY MEN 07. CLERKS 08. COOKS, MESS SERGEANTS 09. OTHER 10. JOB NOT IDENTIFIED FROM ANSWER 00. NO ANSWER

S100A.Q15. HAVE YOU EVER BEEN CITED IN ORDERS OR RECEIVED ANY ARMY DECORATIONS OR AWARD?  01. YES, PURPLE HEART 02. YES, SILVER STAR 03. YES, GOOD CONDUCT 04. YES, PURPLE HEART AND GOOD CONDUCT 05. YES, COMBAT INFANTRY AND GOOD CONDUCT 06. YES, SILVER STAR AND PURPLE HEART 07. YES, OUTFIT CITATION 08. YES, OTHER (NOT COMBINATION OF ANY OF ABOVE) 09. YES, NO DECORATION NAMED 10. NO 00. NO ANSWER
